post.body: Hello ZeroMe! Dare I say this is already 100X better than that bird site? üê£

Decentralized P2P Open Source you could not go wrong. I have been waiting for this technology since Distributed BOINC software and early visions of blockchain.  I am here to make sure we get it right this time.  We will not stop until the user has the power to control their future.

What is the point of the a worldwide information network if individual users are not free to use it as they see fit?  Society will come to a consensus, no user agreements need to be written.  Resistance to established norms is the creative energy to harness, and it is infinite.
I am feeling this service more and more each day.  I feel powerful. I feel like I am in control of my experience.  Decentralized P2P just feels so right :)
I am using more open source software everyday and it feels great
How is the decentralverse doing today?

comment.body: I never had any inclination of knowing the difference between these two models; but, now I do.  Thank You :)
My mind is still blown. Been on here for a few days now.
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: Very cool project. thanks for the info
